testcase.name: Empty form submission
testcase.system-out: Given Admin is on dashboardpage after login.................................passed When Admin Clicks user from Navigation Bar..................................passed Then Admin Should see a heading Manage User.................................passed Given Admin is on Manage User page..........................................passed And Admin is on "Add New User" popup window................................passed When Admin enters "without data" in the form and clicks on "Submit" button..passed Then Admin should see error message below the test field and the field will be highlighed in red color.passed
